creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: woven silk in red, yellow and green with geometric designs and ikat trim; two braided tassels at one end; two leather floral decorations over red velvet; hidden pouch on back; b:  oilcloth (?) fragment--may have been inside pouch (may not be part of this piece)
dimension: 56 11/16 x 3 in. (143.99 x 7.62 cm) (belt, without tassels, including buckles)
title: Belt
